alert.note: Alert for Chariton; Macon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 9:04PM CDT until March 25 at 1:52PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Creek at Blairstown affecting Johnson MO, Cass and Henry Counties. Blackwater River near Blue Lick affecting Saline and Cooper Counties. Chariton River near Prairie Hill affecting Chariton and Macon Counties. Grand River near Sumner affecting Linn MO, Chariton, Livingston and Carroll Counties. For the Big Creek...including Blairstown...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Blackwater River...including Blue Lick...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Chariton River...including Prairie Hill...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Grand River...including Sumner...Moderate flooding is forecast. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chariton River near Prairie Hill. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Fields along the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 3.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday afternoon to a crest of 15.8 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
